an8.80:3.3: I think it’s important to mention the word “walk in such cases, as most people don” t think of walking when going on a journey.
an8.80:5.1: BB has “as much as he needs” for yavadattha, but contexts in AN consistently use it in the sense of “as much as he likes”, which is typically more than they need.
an8.80:5.3: BB’s “pliable” here doesn’t fit. Here as elsewhere kammanna means “fit for work, ready to do work”.
